thread.title_full: These 15 Tweets & Memes Perfectly Explain The Awesomeness Of Lady Gaga's Super Bowl Performance - Indiatimes.com

title: These 15 Tweets & Memes Perfectly Explain The Awesomeness Of Lady Gaga's Super Bowl Performance - Indiatimes.com
text:
Bhavya Sadhwani February 06, 2017 Well, Lady Gaga never disappoints. She took the world by storm on Sunday with her Super Bowl LI performance. Yes, world because everyone was hooked! People were fiercely tweeting and applauding her kickass performance. Over 5.1 million tweets were recorded during her performance alone. 
getty 
Not only did she belt out some of her biggest hits like “Edge of Glory,”“Bad Romance,”“Poker Face,”“Born This Way,”“Telephone,” and “Just Dance” , she left everyone awestruck with her moves. With an army of backup dancers, fireworks and glitter, Lady Gaga brightened up everyone’s day with an exhilarating performance. The Million Reasons singer ended her fabulous performance by dropping a mic and then jumping off the stage. No, we are not kidding! 
getty 
Not just the social world, even celebrities couldn’t help but rave about it on Twitter. Her contemporaries, fellow celebrities and others flooded Twitter with congratulatory messages. However, we all know how internet is a mean place. Many trolls and memes also surfaced on the internet. We hand-picked some of the funniest ones for you. Scroll and say goodbye to your Monday blues *wink*: #1
